NESTLÉ Scary Assorted Halloween Full-Sized Bars Carton 8 pack

text: Master trick-or-treating, scary scavenger hunts, and Halloween party time with this 40-pack of NESTLÉ KITKAT Scary Friends (328 g). Get spook-tacularly smooth milk chocolate with classic crispy KITKAT wafer pieces in the shapes of Dracula, Frankenstein's Monster, a Bat, a Witch, and a Mummy. These terrifying treats are made with all natural flavours and sustainably sourced cocoa. Stay Spooky with NESTLÉ and share your love of these sweet treats with family, friends, ghouls, ghosts, and goblins. Put on your best costume and enjoy them all! HAVE A BREAK, HAVE A KITKAT.
KITKAT Halloween Scary Friends 40 packFeatures and Benefits
Treat your trick-or-treaters to something spooky on Halloween with this 40-pack of individually wrapped NESTLÉ KITKAT Scary Friends
Enjoy the irresistibly smooth milk chocolate, with pieces of our classic crispy KITKAT wafer - made with all natural flavours and sustainably sourced cocoa
Comes in Dracula, Frankenstein's Monster, Bat, Witch, and Mummy shapes
Our cocoa is sustainably sourced and 100% certified, as part of the NESTLÉ COCOA PLAN. By working with the Rainforest Alliance, NESTLÉ supports Cocoa farmers and the quality of their products.
We proudly support Kids Help Phone! NESTLÉ Canada has raised more than $11.5 million in support of Kids Help Phone over the last 32 years
KITKAT Halloween Scary Friends 40 packNutrition Information

Milk Chocolate (Sugar, Modified Milk Ingredients, Cocoa Butter*, Unsweetened Chocolate*, Sunflower Lecithin), Sugar, Palm and Vegetable Oils, Modified Milk Ingredients, Rice Flour, Cocoa Powder*, Unsweetened Chocolate*, Potato And Corn Starch, Sunflower Lecithin, Baking Soda, Salt, Natural Flavour, Bamboo Powder. *Rainforest Alliance certified. May contain: Tree nuts.
